page.title: 08A COUNTRY VICAR'S SUNDAY
page.content: For the country{Vicar}no two days are alike.He starts his day by getting up at about 7:00am(on Sunday,6:30am).He then goes to the Church and prepares for the service,which begins at 8:00am and lasts for about forty minutes because there are no hymns and no sermon.When everyone has left,he stays behind to prepare for the next service at 10:00am.This lasts a full seventy minutes,and there are hymns and a sermon.By the time everyone has left, the time is about 11:30am. From then on until lunch(1:30pm),he may either,fill in different forms or travel around his Parish talking to and consoling people.From lunch until the evensong service(6:00pm) he may be {Baptising}someone(there are about forty people per annum)or attending the funeral of one of his Parishioners. .
